name: Fine Tuned!
description:
Fine Tuned is a short game where you tune your radio, matching the color of the enemies to destroy them.

Credits:

Art and Coding: Andrei Tache

Music and Sounds: Caleb Andrews   (Soundcloud)

You can check my other games here: (Itch.io) and here: (Google Play)

Made with Construct 2 Personal Edition;

Art made with Paint.Net.
